Dataset brief description: The following list corresponds to the main parks and green areas of Madrid whose conservation corresponds to the City of Madrid, with their detailed characteristics.

Dataset name: Spain: greenery per inhabitant in the city of Madrid 2018
Dataset brief description: This statistic shows the green space per inhabitant in the city of Madrid
In this data set you can obtain the information collected by the air quality control stations, with the daily data by annuities from 2001 to 2020.
The data is taken from AEMET from 3 different meteorologic stations, showing each day's temperature.
This data set contain information about the multiple municipal study and reading rooms in Madrid.
